title: Elucidating bis-pyrimidines as new and efficient mushroom tyrosinase inhibitors: synthesis, SAR, kinetics and computational studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22769-22780
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04652H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Manazza Afzal, Rabia Mehmood, Ehsan Ullah Mughal, Nafeesa Naeem, Zaman Ashraf, Yasir Nazir, Fatma Mohsen Shalaby, Amal El-Sayed Abd El Hady, Amina Sadiq
In this study, a series of novel bis-pyrimidine derivatives (1P–8P) were designed, synthesized, characterized, and investigated for their in vitro inhibitory activity against mushroom tyrosinase.
